entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Parent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:15 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
